verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came again unto me saying
בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of man שְׁתַּ֣יִם <WH8147> there were two נָשִׁ֔ים <WH802> women בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> the daughters אֵם־ <WH517> mother אַחַ֖ת <WH259> of one הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become

וַתִּזְנֶ֣ינָה <WH2181> And they committed whoredoms בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in Egypt בִּנְעוּרֵיהֶ֖ן <WH5271> in their youth זָנ֑וּ <WH2181> they committed whoredoms שָׁ֚מָּה <WH8033> there מֹעֲכ֣וּ <WH4600> pressed שְׁדֵיהֶ֔ן <WH7699> there were their breasts וְשָׁ֣ם <WH8033> and there עִשּׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and there they bruised דַּדֵּ֖י <WH1717> the teats בְּתוּלֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH1331> of their virginity

וּשְׁמוֹתָ֗ן <WH8034> And the names אָהֳלָ֤ה <WH170> of them [were] Aholah הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> the elder וְאָהֳלִיבָ֣ה <WH172> and Aholibah אֲחוֹתָ֔הּ <WH269> her sister וַתִּֽהְיֶ֣ינָה <WH1961> became לִ֔י וַתֵּלַ֖דְנָה <WH3205> and they were mine and they bare בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנ֑וֹת <WH1323> and daughters וּשְׁמוֹתָ֕ן <WH8034> Thus [were] their names שֹׁמְר֣וֹן <WH8111> Samaria אָהֳלָ֔ה <WH170> [is] Aholah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem אָהֳלִיבָֽה׃ <WH172> Aholibah

וַתִּ֥זֶן <WH2181> played the harlot אָהֳלָ֖ה <WH170> And Aholah תַּחְתָּ֑י <WH8478> when she was mine וַתַּעְגַּב֙ <WH5689> and she doted עַֽל־ <WH5921> after מְאַהֲבֶ֔יהָ <WH157> on her lovers אֶל־ <WH413> after אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> on the Assyrians קְרוֹבִֽים׃ <WH7138> [her] neighbours

לְבֻשֵׁ֤י <WH3847> [Which were] clothed תְכֵ֙לֶת֙ <WH8504> with blue פַּח֣וֹת <WH6346> captains וּסְגָנִ֔ים <WH5461> and rulers בַּח֥וּרֵי <WH970> young men חֶ֖מֶד <WH2531> all of them desirable כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> all פָּרָשִׁ֕ים <WH6571> horsemen רֹכְבֵ֖י <WH7392> riding סוּסִֽים׃ <WH5483> upon horses

וַתִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> Thus she committed תַּזְנוּתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH8457> her whoredoms עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> them מִבְחַ֥ר <WH4005> with them with all them [that were] the chosen בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> men אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> of Assyria כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> all וּבְכֹ֧ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom עָֽגְבָ֛ה <WH5689> and with all on whom she doted בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all גִּלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1544> with all their idols נִטְמָֽאָה׃ <WH2930> she defiled

וְאֶת־ <WH853> תַּזְנוּתֶ֤יהָ <WH8457> she her whoredoms מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> [brought] from Egypt לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not עָזָ֔בָה <WH5800> Neither left כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אוֹתָהּ֙ <WH854> for שָׁכְב֣וּ <WH7901> they lay בִנְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <WH5271> for in her youth וְהֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> like עִשּׂ֖וּ <WH6213> with her and they bruised דַּדֵּ֣י <WH1717> the breasts בְתוּלֶ֑יהָ <WH1331> of her virginity וַיִּשְׁפְּכ֥וּ <WH8210> and poured תַזְנוּתָ֖ם <WH8457> their whoredom עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

לָכֵ֥ן <WH3651> Therefore נְתַתִּ֖יהָ <WH5414> Wherefore I have delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> her into the hand מְאַֽהֲבֶ֑יהָ <WH157> of her lovers בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> into the hand בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> afflicted אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> Asshur אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom עָגְבָ֖ה <WH5689> upon whom she doted עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> after

הֵמָּה֮ <WH1992> They גִּלּ֣וּ <WH1540> These discovered עֶרְוָתָהּ֒ <WH6172> her nakedness בָּנֶ֤יהָ <WH1121> her sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH1323> and her daughters לָקָ֔חוּ <WH3947> they took וְאוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> her with the sword הָרָ֑גוּ <WH2026> and slew וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> became שֵׁם֙ <WH8034> and she became famous לַנָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> among women וּשְׁפוּטִ֖ים <WH8196> judgment עָ֥שׂוּ <WH6213> for they had executed בָֽהּ׃ ס

וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <WH7200> saw אֲחוֹתָ֣הּ <WH269> And when her sister אָהֳלִיבָ֔ה <WH172> Aholibah וַתַּשְׁחֵ֥ת <WH7843> [this] she was more corrupt עַגְבָתָ֖הּ <WH5691> in her inordinate love מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> was more וְאֶת־ <WH853> תַּ֨זְנוּתֶ֔יהָ <WH8457> than she and in her whoredoms מִזְּנוּנֵ֖י <WH2183> in [her] whoredoms אֲחוֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH269> more than her sister

אֶל־ <WH413> after בְּנֵי֩ <WH1121> afflicted אַשּׁ֨וּר <WH804> Asshur עָגָ֜בָה <WH5689> She doted פַּח֨וֹת <WH6346> captains וּסְגָנִ֤ים <WH5461> and rulers קְרֹבִים֙ <WH7138> [her] neighbours לְבֻשֵׁ֣י <WH3847> clothed מִכְל֔וֹל <WH4358> most gorgeously פָּרָשִׁ֖ים <WH6571> horsemen רֹכְבֵ֣י <WH7392> riding סוּסִ֑ים <WH5483> upon horses בַּח֥וּרֵי <WH970> young men חֶ֖מֶד <WH2531> all of them desirable כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all
וָאֵ֖רֶא <WH7200> Then I saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נִטְמָ֑אָה <WH2930> that she was defiled דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> way אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one לִשְׁתֵּיהֶֽן׃ <WH8147> [that] they [took] both

וַתּ֖וֹסֶף <WH3254> And [that] she increased אֶל־ <WH413> about תַּזְנוּתֶ֑יהָ <WH8457> her whoredoms וַתֵּ֗רֶא <WH7200> for when she saw אַנְשֵׁי֙ <WH376> men מְחֻקֶּ֣ה <WH2707> pourtrayed עַל־ <WH5921> on הַקִּ֔יר <WH7023> upon the wall צַלְמֵ֣י <WH6754> the images [כַשְׂדִּיִּים כ] (כַשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> Chaldeans ק) חֲקֻקִ֖ים <WH2710> pourtrayed בַּשָּׁשַֽׁר׃ <WH8350> with vermilion

חֲגוֹרֵ֨י <WH2289> Girded אֵז֜וֹר <WH232> with girdles בְּמָתְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4975> upon their loins סְרוּחֵ֤י <WH5628> exceeding טְבוּלִים֙ <WH2871> in dyed attire בְּרָ֣אשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH7218> upon their heads מַרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> to look to שָׁלִשִׁ֖ים <WH7991> all of them princes כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> all דְּמ֤וּת <WH1823> after the manner בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> afflicted בָבֶל֙ <WH894> Babel כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> of Chaldea אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land מוֹלַדְתָּֽם׃ <WH4138> of their nativity

[וַתַּעְגַּב כ] (וַתַּעְגְּבָ֥ה <WH5689> dote ק) עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> after לְמַרְאֵ֣ה <WH4758> And as soon as she saw עֵינֶ֑יהָ <WH5869> them with her eyes וַתִּשְׁלַ֧ח <WH7971> upon them and sent מַלְאָכִ֛ים <WH4397> messengers אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> to כַּשְׂדִּֽימָה׃ <WH3778> unto them into Chaldea

וַיָּבֹ֨אוּ <WH935> came אֵלֶ֤יהָ <WH413> about בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> afflicted בָבֶל֙ <WH894> Babel לְמִשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH4904> to her into the bed דֹּדִ֔ים <WH1730> of love וַיְטַמְּא֥וּ <WH2930> and they defiled אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> בְּתַזְנוּתָ֑ם <WH8457> her with their whoredom וַתִּ֨טְמָא־ <WH2930> and she was polluted בָ֔ם וַתֵּ֥קַע <WH3363> was alienated נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> with them and her mind מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

וַתְּגַל֙ <WH1540> So she discovered תַּזְנוּתֶ֔יהָ <WH8457> her whoredoms וַתְּגַ֖ל <WH1540> and discovered אֶת־ <WH853> עֶרְוָתָ֑הּ <WH6172> her nakedness וַתֵּ֤קַע <WH3363> was alienated נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> then my mind מֵֽעָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after נָקְעָ֥ה <WH5361> was alienated נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> from her like as my mind מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> with אֲחוֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH269> from her sister

וַתַּרְבֶּ֖ה <WH7235> Yet she multiplied אֶת־ <WH853> תַּזְנוּתֶ֑יהָ <WH8457> her whoredoms לִזְכֹּר֙ <WH2142> in calling to remembrance אֶת־ <WH853> יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> the days נְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <WH5271> of her youth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> when זָנְתָ֖ה <WH2181> wherein she had played the harlot בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַֽתַּעְגְּבָ֔ה <WH5689> For she doted עַ֖ל <WH5921> after פִּֽלַגְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <WH6370> upon their paramours אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whose בְּשַׂר־ <WH1320> whose flesh חֲמוֹרִים֙ <WH2543> of asses בְּשָׂרָ֔ם <WH1320> [is as] the flesh וְזִרְמַ֥ת <WH2231> and whose issue סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> of horses זִרְמָתָֽם׃ <WH2231> [is like] the issue

וַֽתִּפְקְדִ֔י <WH6485> Thus thou calledst to remembrance אֵ֖ת <WH853> זִמַּ֣ת <WH2154> the lewdness נְעוּרָ֑יִךְ <WH5271> of thy youth בַּעְשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> in bruising מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> by the Egyptians דַּדַּ֔יִךְ <WH1717> thy teats לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> because שְׁדֵ֥י <WH7699> for the paps נְעוּרָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5271> of thy youth ס

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> Therefore אָהֳלִיבָ֗ה <WH172> Therefore O Aholibah כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מֵעִ֤יר <WH5782> Behold I will raise up אֶת־ <WH853> מְאַהֲבַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH157> thy lovers עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> against אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom נָקְעָ֥ה <WH5361> is alienated נַפְשֵׁ֖ךְ <WH5315> against thee from whom thy mind מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> and I וַהֲבֵאתִ֥ים <WH935> and I will bring עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> against מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> them against thee on every side

בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> afflicted בָבֶ֣ל <WH894> Babel וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all כַּשְׂדִּ֗ים <WH3778> and all the Chaldeans פְּק֤וֹד <WH6489> Pekod וְשׁ֙וֹעַ֙ <WH7772> and Shoa וְק֔וֹעַ <WH6970> and Koa כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> afflicted אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> Asshur אוֹתָ֑ם <WH854> for בַּח֨וּרֵי <WH970> young men חֶ֜מֶד <WH2531> with them all of them desirable פַּח֤וֹת <WH6346> captains וּסְגָנִים֙ <WH5461> and rulers כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> all שָֽׁלִשִׁים֙ <WH7991> great lords וּקְרוּאִ֔ים <WH7121> and renowned רֹכְבֵ֥י <WH7392> all of them riding סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> upon horses כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all

וּבָ֣אוּ <WH935> And they shall come עָלַ֡יִךְ <WH5921> against הֹ֠צֶן <WH2021> against thee with chariots רֶ֤כֶב <WH7393> wagons וְגַלְגַּל֙ <WH1534> and wheels וּבִקְהַ֣ל <WH6951> and with an assembly עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> of people צִנָּ֤ה <WH6793> against thee buckler וּמָגֵן֙ <WH4043> and shield וְקוֹבַ֔ע <WH6959> and helmet יָשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> [which] shall set עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> against סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> and I will set לִפְנֵיהֶם֙ <WH6440> before מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> judgment וּשְׁפָט֖וּךְ <WH8199> them and they shall judge בְּמִשְׁפְּטֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4941> thee according to their judgments

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> And I will set קִנְאָתִ֜י <WH7068> my jealousy בָּ֗ךְ וְעָשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> against thee and they shall deal אוֹתָךְ֙ <WH854> in בְּחֵמָ֔ה <WH2534> furiously אַפֵּ֤ךְ <WH639> thy nose וְאָזְנַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH241> and thine ears יָסִ֔ירוּ <WH5493> with thee they shall take away וְאַחֲרִיתֵ֖ךְ <WH319> and thy remnant בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword תִּפּ֑וֹל <WH5307> shall fall הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like בָּנַ֤יִךְ <WH1121> thy sons וּבְנוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1323> and thy daughters יִקָּ֔חוּ <WH3947> they shall take וְאַחֲרִיתֵ֖ךְ <WH319> and thy residue תֵּאָכֵ֥ל <WH398> shall be devoured בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> by the fire
וְהִפְשִׁיט֖וּךְ <WH6584> They shall also strip אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֑יִךְ <WH899> thee out of thy clothes וְלָקְח֖וּ <WH3947> and take away כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> jewels תִפְאַרְתֵּֽךְ׃ <WH8597> thy fair

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֤י <WH7673> to cease זִמָּתֵךְ֙ <WH2154> Thus will I make thy lewdness מִמֵּ֔ךְ <WH4480> at וְאֶת־ <WH853> זְנוּתֵ֖ךְ <WH2184> from thee and thy whoredom מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> [brought] from the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> you will not תִשְׂאִ֤י <WH5375> so that thou shalt not lift up עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5869> thine eyes אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> Egypt לֹ֥א <WH3808> or תִזְכְּרִי־ <WH2142> unto them nor remember עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3068> GOD הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> behold נֹֽתְנָ֔ךְ <WH5414> Behold I will deliver בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> thee into the hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom שָׂנֵ֑את <WH8130> [of them] whom thou hatest בְּיַ֛ד <WH3027> into the hand אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom נָקְעָ֥ה <WH5361> is alienated נַפְשֵׁ֖ךְ <WH5315> [of them] from whom thy mind מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> They

וְעָשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> And they shall deal אוֹתָ֜ךְ <WH854> in בְּשִׂנְאָ֗ה <WH8135> with thee hatefully וְלָקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> and shall take away כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְגִיעֵ֔ךְ <WH3018> all thy labour וַעֲזָב֖וּךְ <WH5800> and shall leave עֵירֹ֣ם <WH5903> thee naked וְעֶרְיָ֑ה <WH6181> and bare וְנִגְלָה֙ <WH1540> shall be discovered עֶרְוַ֣ת <WH6172> and the nakedness זְנוּנַ֔יִךְ <WH2183> of thy whoredoms וְזִמָּתֵ֖ךְ <WH2154> both thy lewdness וְתַזְנוּתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH8457> and thy whoredoms

עָשֹׂ֥ה <WH6213> I will do אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These לָ֑ךְ בִּזְנוֹתֵךְ֙ <WH2181> these [things] unto thee because thou hast gone a whoring אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after גוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> the heathen עַ֥ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you נִטְמֵ֖את <WH2930> [and] because thou art polluted בְּגִלּוּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1544> with their idols

בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way אֲחוֹתֵ֖ךְ <WH269> of thy sister הָלָ֑כְתְּ <WH1980> Thou hast walked וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> therefore will I give כוֹסָ֖הּ <WH3563> her cup בְּיָדֵֽךְ׃ <WH3027> into thine hand ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD כּ֤וֹס <WH3563> cup אֲחוֹתֵךְ֙ <WH269> of thy sister's תִּשְׁתִּ֔י <WH8354> Thou shalt drink הָעֲמֻקָּ֖ה <WH6013> deep וְהָרְחָבָ֑ה <WH7342> and large תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לִצְחֹ֛ק <WH6712> thou shalt be laughed to scorn וּלְלַ֖עַג <WH3932> mock מִרְבָּ֥ה <WH4767> much לְהָכִֽיל׃ <WH3557> it containeth

שִׁכָּר֥וֹן <WH7943> with drunkenness וְיָג֖וֹן <WH3015> and sorrow תִּמָּלֵ֑אִי <WH4390> Thou shalt be filled כּ֚וֹס <WH3563> with the cup שַׁמָּ֣ה <WH8047> of astonishment וּשְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> and desolation כּ֖וֹס <WH3563> with the cup אֲחוֹתֵ֥ךְ <WH269> of thy sister שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> Samaria

וְשָׁתִ֨ית <WH8354> Thou shalt even drink אוֹתָ֜הּ <WH853> וּמָצִ֗ית <WH4680> it and suck [it] out וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲרָשֶׂ֛יהָ <WH2789> the sherds תְּגָרֵ֖מִי <WH1633> and thou shalt break וְשָׁדַ֣יִךְ <WH7699> thine own breasts תְּנַתֵּ֑קִי <WH5423> thereof and pluck off כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Because שָׁכַ֣חַתְּ <WH7911> Because thou hast forgotten אוֹתִ֔י <WH853> וַתַּשְׁלִ֥יכִי <WH7993> me and cast אוֹתִ֖י <WH853> אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> me behind גַוֵּ֑ךְ <WH1458> thy back וְגַם־ <WH1571> now אַ֛תְּ <WH859> you שְׂאִ֥י <WH5375> therefore bear זִמָּתֵ֖ךְ <WH2154> thou also thy lewdness וְאֶת־ <WH853> תַּזְנוּתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH8457> and thy whoredoms ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> moreover unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הֲתִשְׁפּ֥וֹט <WH8199> wilt thou judge אֶֽת־ <WH853> אָהֳלָ֖ה <WH170> Aholah וְאֶת־ <WH853> אָהֳלִיבָ֑ה <WH172> Oholibah וְהַגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> bewray לָהֶ֔ן אֵ֖ת <WH853> תוֹעֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH8441> unto them their abominations

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נִאֵ֗פוּ <WH5003> That they have committed adultery וְדָם֙ <WH1818> and blood בִּֽידֵיהֶ֔ן <WH3027> [is] in their hands וְאֶת־ <WH854> with גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֖ן <WH1544> and with their idols נִאֵ֑פוּ <WH5003> have they committed adultery וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> and even אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶן֙ <WH1121> and have also caused their sons אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יָֽלְדוּ־ <WH3205> whom they bare לִ֔י הֶעֱבִ֥ירוּ <WH5674> unto me to pass for them through לָהֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> [the fire] to devour

ע֥וֹד <WH5750> Again זֹ֖את <WH2063> they עָ֣שׂוּ <WH6213> Moreover this they have done לִ֑י טִמְּא֤וּ <WH2930> unto me they have defiled אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <WH4720> my sanctuary בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in the same day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> the same וְאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <WH7676> my sabbaths חִלֵּֽלוּ׃ <WH2490> and have profaned

וּֽבְשַׁחֲטָ֤ם <WH7819> For when they had slain אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> their children לְגִלּ֣וּלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1544> to their idols וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> then they came אֶל־ <WH413> about מִקְדָּשִׁ֛י <WH4720> into my sanctuary בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> the same לְחַלְּל֑וֹ <WH2490> to profane וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and lo כֹ֥ה <WH3541> thus עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> it and lo thus have they done בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst בֵּיתִֽי׃ <WH1004> of mine house

וְאַ֗ף <WH637> And furthermore כִּ֤י <WH3588> have even תִשְׁלַ֙חְנָה֙ <WH7971> that ye have sent לַֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> men בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> to come מִמֶּרְחָ֑ק <WH4801> from far אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom מַלְאָ֜ךְ <WH4397> unto whom a messenger שָׁל֤וּחַ <WH7971> [was] sent אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> and וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> lo בָ֔אוּ <WH935> and lo they came לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> to whom רָחַ֛צְתְּ <WH7364> for whom thou didst wash כָּחַ֥לְתְּ <WH3583> thyself paintedst עֵינַ֖יִךְ <WH5869> thy eyes וְעָ֥דִית <WH5710> and deckedst עֶֽדִי׃ <WH5716> thyself with ornaments

וְיָשַׁבְתְּ֙ <WH3427> And satest עַל־ <WH5921> and מִטָּ֣ה <WH4296> bed כְבוּדָּ֔ה <WH3520> upon a stately וְשֻׁלְחָ֥ן <WH7979> and a table עָר֖וּךְ <WH6186> prepared לְפָנֶ֑יהָ <WH6440> before וּקְטָרְתִּ֥י <WH7004> mine incense וְשַׁמְנִ֖י <WH8081> and mine oil שַׂ֥מְתְּ <WH7760> it whereupon thou hast set עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> And a voice הָמוֹן֮ <WH1995> of a multitude שָׁלֵ֣ו <WH7961> being at ease בָהּ֒ וְאֶל־ <WH413> with אֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> men מֵרֹ֣ב <WH7230> abundance אָדָ֔ם <WH120> man מוּבָאִ֥ים <WH935> [were] brought [סֹובָאִים כ] (סָבָאִ֖ים <WH5433> drunkard ק) מִמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> from the wilderness וַֽיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> which put צְמִידִים֙ <WH6781> bracelets אֶל־ <WH413> on יְדֵיהֶ֔ן <WH3027> upon their hands וַעֲטֶ֥רֶת <WH5850> crowns תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <WH8597> and beautiful עַל־ <WH5921> on רָאשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <WH7218> upon their heads

וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> Then said לַבָּלָ֖ה <WH1087> I unto [her that was] old נִֽאוּפִ֑ים <WH5004> in adulteries [עַתָּ כ] (עַתָּ֛ה ק) [יִזְנֻה כ] (יִזְנ֥וּ <WH2181> commit fornication ק) תַזְנוּתֶ֖הָ <WH8457> whoredoms וָהִֽיא׃ <WH1931> they

וַיָּב֣וֹא <WH935> Yet they went in אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> to כְּב֖וֹא <WH935> unto her as they go in אֶל־ <WH413> about אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> unto a woman זוֹנָ֑ה <WH2181> that playeth the harlot כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> Thus בָּ֗אוּ <WH935> so went they in אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אָֽהֳלָה֙ <WH170> unto Aholah וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to אָ֣הֳלִיבָ֔ה <WH172> and unto Aholibah אִשֹּׁ֖ת <WH802> women הַזִּמָּֽה׃ <WH2154> the lewd

וַאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> men צַדִּיקִ֗ם <WH6662> And the righteous הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> like יִשְׁפְּט֣וּ <WH8199> they shall judge אֽוֹתְהֶ֔ם <WH853> מִשְׁפַּט֙ <WH4941> them after the manner נֹֽאֲפ֔וֹת <WH5003> of adulteresses וּמִשְׁפַּ֖ט <WH4941> and after the manner שֹׁפְכ֣וֹת <WH8210> of women that shed דָּ֑ם <WH1818> blood כִּ֤י <WH3588> because נֹֽאֲפֹת֙ <WH5003> because they [are] adulteresses הֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> in וְדָ֖ם <WH1818> and blood בִּֽידֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH3027> [is] in their hands ס

כִּ֛י <WH3588> For כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD הַעֲלֵ֤ה <WH5927> I will bring up עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> against קָהָ֔ל <WH6951> a company וְנָתֹ֥ן <WH5414> upon them and will give אֶתְהֶ֖ן <WH853> לְזַעֲוָ֥ה <WH2189> them to be removed וְלָבַֽז׃ <WH957> and spoiled

וְרָגְמ֨וּ <WH7275> shall stone עֲלֵיהֶ֥ן <WH5921> with אֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> them with stones קָהָ֔ל <WH6951> And the company וּבָרֵ֥א <WH1254> and dispatch אוֹתְהֶ֖ן <WH853> בְּחַרְבוֹתָ֑ם <WH2719> them with their swords בְּנֵיהֶ֤ם <WH1121> their sons וּבְנֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH1323> and their daughters יַהֲרֹ֔גוּ <WH2026> they shall slay וּבָתֵּיהֶ֖ן <WH1004> their houses בָּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> with fire יִשְׂרֹֽפוּ׃ <WH8313> and burn up

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֥י <WH7673> to cease זִמָּ֖ה <WH2154> Thus will I cause lewdness מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> out of the land וְנִֽוַּסְּרוּ֙ <WH3256> may be taught כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> that all women וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not תַעֲשֶׂ֖ינָה <WH6213> not to do כְּזִמַּתְכֶֽנָה׃ <WH2154> after your lewdness

וְנָתְנ֤וּ <WH5414> And they shall recompense זִמַּתְכֶ֙נָה֙ <WH2154> your lewdness עֲלֵיכֶ֔ן <WH5921> and וַחֲטָאֵ֥י <WH2399> the sins גִלּוּלֵיכֶ֖ן <WH1544> of your idols תִּשֶּׂ֑אינָה <WH5375> upon you and ye shall bear וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּ֥י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
